1: don <mistake>zhin</mistake> <mistake>rag/ /pha rol</mistake> <mistake>phyan</mistake> pa kun rdzogs <mistake>pa//sa</mistake> rnams thams <mistake>ca</mistake> <mistake>rnam</mistake> par <mistake>brgyan//rnam</mistake> <mistake>par</mistake> dag pa bdag med <mistake>chos//yang</mistake> dag <mistake>yehes</mistake> <mistake>zla</mistake> <mistake>'od</mistake> <mistake>bzang// skyu</mistake> 'phrul dra ba rnal 'byor <mistake>the//rgyud</mistake> kun gyi ni bdag
2: po <mistake>mchog/ma</mistake> lus rdo rje <mistake>skyal</mistake> krung <mistake>ste//ye</mistake> shes sku rnams ma lus <mistake>'chang//kug</mistake> <mistake>tu</mistake> bzang po blo gros <mistake>bzang//sa</mistake> yi snying po 'gro ba <mistake>'dzin//sangs</mistake> rgyas kun gyi <mistake>sdying</mistake> po <mistake>che//sna</mistake> tshogs sprul pa'i
3: 'khor lo <mistake>'chang//dngos</mistake> po kun gyi rang bzhin <mistake>mchog /dngos</mistake> <mistake>po</mistake> kun gyi rang <mistake>bzhin</mistake> <mistake>'jin//skye</mistake> med chos te sna tshogs <mistake>don//chos</mistake> kun ngo <mistake>po</mistake> nyid <mistake>'chanr</mistake> <mistake>ba//skad</mistake> cig gcig la shes rab <mistake>ches//</mistake>
4: chos kun khong du chud pa <mistake>'chang//chos</mistake> kun mngon par rtogs pa <mistake>ste//thub</mistake> pa blo mchog yang dag <mistake>mtha'// mi</mistake> <mistake>g.yo</mistake> rab tu dang ba'i <mistake>bdag /rdzogs</mistake> pa'i <mistake>sangs</mistake> rgyas byang chub <mistake>'chang//sangs</mistake>
5: rgyas kun gyi <mistake>mdgon</mistake> sum <mistake>pa//ye</mistake> shes me lce 'od rab <mistake>gsal//so</mistake> <mistake>sar</mistake> gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi <mistake>tshigs</mistake> su bcad pa bzhi bcu <mistake>rtsag</mistake> <mistake>nyis</mistake> <mistake>so/a//'dod</mistake> pa'i don grub dam ba <mistake>ste//ngna</mistake> song thams
6: cad rnam sbyong <mistake>ba//mgon</mistake> po sems can kun gyi <mistake>mchog /sems</mistake> can thams cad rab grol <mistake>byed //nyon</mistake> mongs <mistake>g.yul</mistake> du gcig dpa' <mistake>ba//mi</mistake> shes <mistake>dgra</mistake> yi dregs pa <mistake>'joms// blo</mistake> ni sgeg 'chang
7: dpal dang <mistake>ldan//dpa'</mistake> <mistake>bo</mistake> mi sdug gzugs 'chang <mistake>ba// lag</mistake> pa'i dbyug pa brgya bskyod <mistake>cing//rkang</mistake> pa bskyod bas gar byed <mistake>pa// dpal</mistake> ldan lag <mistake>pa</mistake> brgyas gang <mistake>la//nam</mistake> mkha' khyab par gar
8: byed <mistake>pa//rkang</mistake> pa gcig gis mthil gnon <mistake>pa//sa</mistake> yi snying <mistake>po'i</mistake> mthil la <mistake>gnas //tshangs</mistake> pa'i <mistake>sgonga'i</mistake> rtse mo <mistake>gnon//rkang</mistake> 'theb sen <mistake>mo la</mistake> gnas <mistake>pa//don</mistake> gcig gnyis med chos kyi <mistake>don//dam</mistake>
